login_failed:
The login information is incorrect. 
Please check your email and password.
login_failed_server:
We are experiencing technical difficulties. 
Please try again later
description_forgot_password: No worries, we'll send you the reset instructions.
email_sent_description: If an account is associated with this email, you will receive a link to reset your password.
invalid_link_description:
This password reset link has expired or is invalid. 
Please request a new link.
reset_password_desc: Please enter a new password for your account.
signup_description: Sign up to access all our features and enjoy our services.
name: Name
signup_failed_server: An error occurred during registration. Please try again.
user_exists: This user already exists. Please use a different email address or log in.
description_profil: Edit your personal information and adjust your profile settings to personalize your experience.
ask_change_email_description:
Please enter your new email address. 
A confirmation email will be sent to validate this modification.
email_already_exist:
This email address is already in use. 
Please choose another one.
email_sented_description:
A confirmation email has been sent. 
Please check your inbox to confirm this action.
reset_email_desc:
Your email address has been successfully updated. 
You can now use this address to log in and receive our communications.
invalid_link_email_description:
The reset link is invalid or expired. 
Please check your email for a new link or start the reset process again
password_min_length: The password must be at least 8 characters long
password_max_length: The password must not exceed 50 characters
password_must_contain: The password must contain at least one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, one number, and one special character
old_password_incorrect: The old password does not match
password_updated: Your password has been successfully changed
delete_account_description: You will permanently delete the account as well as access to all workspaces
description_all_delete_account: This action is irreversible. Your entire account will be permanently deleted. All workspaces where you are the sole member will also be deleted. In shared workspaces, if you are the only administrator, your role will be transferred to another member.
write_email_to_delete: Type your email address to confirm.
email_not_match: The email address does not match
description_member: Manage the members of your workspace by assigning roles and adding new users.
add_member_description: Enter the email address of the person you want to add to this workspace. They will receive an invitation email and must already have an account to join this workspace.
user_already_add: This user has already been added to the workspace.
user_invited_description: <important>{email}</important> has been successfully invited to join the workspace <important>{workspace}</important>.
error_append:
An error has occurred. 
Please try again.
invite_workspace: <important>{username}</important> has invited you to join the workspace <important>{workspace}</important>.
user_role_updated: Your role in the workspace <important>{accountName}</important> has been changed to <important>{role}</important>.
user_left_account: You have been removed from the workspace <important>{accountName}</important>.
delete_workspace_description: You will permanently delete this workspace and all associated data. This action is irreversible.
description_delete_workspace: This action is irreversible. Once deleted, all data associated with this workspace will be permanently lost.
create_new_workspace_description: Enter a name for your new workspace to start collaborating.
